001package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.shape;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004import squidpony.squidgrid.Direction;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a tile that is edge and corner (which are considered edges
008 * centered at the corner) aware for matching with other tiles.
009 *
010 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
011 */
012@Beta
013public interface WangTile {
014
015    /**
016     * Returns the pattern of the edge at the given direction.
017     *
018     * @param dir the edge to check
019     * @return the edge found
020     */
021    public WangEdge getEdge(Direction dir);
022}
